title: Establish Settlement
description: You draw up plans, gather resources, entice citizens, and establish boundaries to found a brand new settlement in the hex. Attempt a basic Engineering, Industry, Politics, or Scholarship check. If you cannot pay the RP required by the result of this check, treat your result as a critical failure. A settlement always starts as a village. See page 540 for further details about building settlements.
requirement: The hex in which you’re establishing the settlement has been Cleared and doesn’t currently have a settlement (including a Freehold) in it.

criticalSuccess.msg: You establish the settlement largely with the aid of enthusiastic volunteers. <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="resource-points" data-mode="lose" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="1d6">Lose 1d6 Resource Points</button>

success.msg: You establish the settlement. <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="resource-points" data-mode="lose" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="3d6">Lose 3d6 Resource Points</button>

failure.msg: You establish the settlement, but inefficiently and at great expense. <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="resource-points" data-mode="lose" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="6d6">Lose 6d6 Resource Points</button>

criticalFailure.msg: You fail to establish the settlement.
